Trigger.Name: Tailwind
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Tailwind

Trigger.Name: Primordial Crust
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Primordial Crust

Trigger.Name: Rime Wreath
Trigger.RegularExpression: The ancient dragon readies Rime Wreath

Trigger.Name: Frost Breath
Trigger.RegularExpression: The ancient dragon uses Frost Breath

Trigger.Name: Larboard Surge
Trigger.RegularExpression: Omega readies Larboard Wave Cannon Surge

Trigger.Name: Starboard Surge
Trigger.RegularExpression: Omega readies Starboard Wave Cannon Surge

Trigger.Name: Last Kiss
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:312f:(?<char>[a-zA-Z']*) [a-zA-Z']{1,} suffers the effect of Last Kiss

Trigger.Name: Rage of Bahamut
Trigger.RegularExpression: Bahamut Prime readies Rage of Bahamut

Trigger.Name: Vice And Virtue
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:(?<cast>[\w]{4}):Eden Prime starts using Vice And Virtue

Trigger.Name: Delta Attack
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:(?<cast>[\w]{4}):Eden Prime starts using Delta Attack on Eden Prime

Trigger.Name: Tsunami Debuff
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of (?<waters>Scouring|Smothering|Splashing|Sundering|Surging|Sweeping|Swirling) Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)
Trigger.Description: Waters: Scouring = Defamation Smothering = Shared Stack Splashing = Cleanse Debuff Sundering = Wave Knockback Surging = Initial Knockback Sweeping = Cone Swirling = Donut

Trigger.Name: Tsunami Timers
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of (?<waters>Smothering|Surging) Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)
Trigger.Description: Waters: Scouring = Defamation Smothering = Shared Stack Splashing = Cleanse Debuff Sundering = Wave Knockback Surging = Initial Knockback Sweeping = Cone Swirling = Donut

Trigger.Name: Empty Rage
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3E6B:The Hand Of Erebos starts using (?:Empty Rage|)

Trigger.Name: Empty Hate
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3E59:The Hand Of Erebos starts using (?:Empty Hate|)

Trigger.Name: Wyrmclaw
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Wyrmclaw from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: Wyrmfang
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Wyrmfang from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: Refulgent Chain
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Refulgent Chain

Trigger.Name: Betwixt Worlds
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4CFD:The Idol Of Darkness starts using Betwixt Worlds

Trigger.Name: False Midnight
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4C99:The Idol Of Darkness starts using False Midnight

Trigger.Name: Crusade
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4C76:The Idol Of Darkness starts using Crusade

Trigger.Name: False Down
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4C9A:The Idol Of Darkness starts using False Down

Trigger.Name: Threefold Grace
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4C7E:The Idol Of Darkness starts using Threefold Grace

Trigger.Name: Teleport
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of (?<dir>Left|Right|Forward|Back) With Thee

Trigger.Name: Deadly Discharge
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:[0-9A-F]{4}:Will of Ramuh starts using Deadly Discharge
